descriptionHtml:
==============================================
                Schiavona
==============================================



1. About
This mod adds the Schiavona - basket-hilted sword. It was popular in Italy during the 16th and 17th centuries. 
Mod adds two versions:
1) Basic. It can be crafted in any forge (steel smithing perk needed). This version has the same attack power as steel sword but a little faster and lighter. Enchantable and temperable.
2) Improved. Has 25% critical chance, and bigger attack power. But you will need flawless diamond + some other resources. 

All meshes and textures are mine. None data was imported from other games.



2. Installation: 
Simply extract Schiavona_EN.bsa and Schiavona_en.esp to skyrim/data folder and make sure that \"Schiavona_en.esp\" is checked in the Data files. Nothing special.



3. Uninstallation:
Delete Schiavona_EN.bsa and Schiavona_en.esp from \"Data\" folder. 



4. Author: DeadMaroz



5.Credits:
Bethesda - for the game



You can use this in your mods but ask me first.
